title: Best Samsung Galaxy A15 screen protectors
description: Keep your Samsung Galaxy A15 display protected with these screen protectors. The post Best Samsung Galaxy A15 screen protectors appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Ajit Singh
excerpt: Keep your Samsung Galaxy A15 display protected with these screen protectors.
text: The Samsung Galaxy A15 is an entry-level smartphone but offers an impressive display. It has a 6.5-inch Full HD+ (1080 x 2340 pixels) Super AMOLED display with a 90Hz refresh rate. There is a dot-like notch at the top which houses a 13MP front camera. The official display protection for the phone is unknown but regardless, you will need a screen protector for enhanced safety. It will prevent your phone’s display from getting scratched and other damages. Here are the best Samsung Galaxy A15 screen protectors. Sale JETech Screen Protector (3-pack) This is an affordable screen protector who do not want to go for something expensive. It offers a perfect fit for the iPhone and complete coverage. You get three screen protectors with the package. Sale Supershieldz Screen Protector (2-pack) This screen protector is also 9H rated and is rainbow-effect proof. It has 2.5D rounded edge glass and it maintains the original touch experience. You get two screen protectors with the package. Sale Mr. Shield Screen Protector (3-pack) This screen protector package comes with three units. This is one of the cheapest screen protectors that you can get. It provides good safety through 9H-rated hardness and also has an oleophobic coating. You get three units of screen protectors with this package. Sale NEW'C Screen Protector (3-pack) This NEW’C screen protector promises a bubble-free application. It maintains high transparency and responsiveness. It is scratch-resistant and has 9H-rated hardness. It is ultra-thin with just 0.33mm thickness. You get an oleophobic coating that keeps fingerprints away. Beukei Screen Protector (3-pack) This tempered glass screen protector also has 9H rated hardness. It is anti-fingerprint and anti-scratch properties. You get 2.5D rounded edges here as well. Oleophobic and hydrophobic coating reduces fingerprints and sweat. Sale OMOTON Screen Protector with Camera Lens Protectors (3+2 pack) This is a screen protector with 2.5D rounded design for comfortable gripping. It has 9H-rated hardness to keep the display protected from scratches. It will maintain the display quality and responsiveness. You get three screen protectors and two camera lens protectors. html:
The Samsung Galaxy A15 is an entry-level smartphone but offers an impressive display. It has a 6.5-inch Full HD+ (1080 x 2340 pixels) Super AMOLED display with a 90Hz refresh rate. There is a dot-like notch at the top which houses a 13MP front camera.

The official display protection for the phone is unknown but regardless, you will need a screen protector for enhanced safety. It will prevent your phone’s display from getting scratched and other damages. Here are the best Samsung Galaxy A15 screen protectors.

Sale

JETech Screen Protector (3-pack)

This is an affordable screen protector who do not want to go for something expensive. It offers a perfect fit for the iPhone and complete coverage. You get three screen protectors with the package.

Sale

Supershieldz Screen Protector (2-pack)

This screen protector is also 9H rated and is rainbow-effect proof. It has 2.5D rounded edge glass and it maintains the original touch experience. You get two screen protectors with the package.

Sale

Mr. Shield Screen Protector (3-pack)

This screen protector package comes with three units. This is one of the cheapest screen protectors that you can get. It provides good safety through 9H-rated hardness and also has an oleophobic coating. You get three units of screen protectors with this package.

Sale

NEW'C Screen Protector (3-pack)

This NEW’C screen protector promises a bubble-free application. It maintains high transparency and responsiveness. It is scratch-resistant and has 9H-rated hardness. It is ultra-thin with just 0.33mm thickness. You get an oleophobic coating that keeps fingerprints away.

Beukei Screen Protector (3-pack)

This tempered glass screen protector also has 9H rated hardness. It is anti-fingerprint and anti-scratch properties. You get 2.5D rounded edges here as well. Oleophobic and hydrophobic coating reduces fingerprints and sweat.

Sale

OMOTON Screen Protector with Camera Lens Protectors (3+2 pack)

This is a screen protector with 2.5D rounded design for comfortable gripping. It has 9H-rated hardness to keep the display protected from scratches. It will maintain the display quality and responsiveness. You get three screen protectors and two camera lens protectors.
